verses.kjv: Therefore seeing we have this ministry, as we have received mercy, we faint not;
verses.web: Therefore seeing we have this ministry, even as we obtained mercy, we don’t faint.
verses.ct: Since God has given us this ministry out of his mercy, we don't lose heart.

verses.kjv: But have renounced the hidden things of dishonesty, not walking in craftiness, nor handling the word of God deceitfully; but by manifestation of the truth commending ourselves to every man’s conscience in the sight of God.
verses.web: But we have renounced the hidden things of shame, not walking in craftiness, nor handling the word of God deceitfully, but by the manifestation of the truth commending ourselves to every man’s conscience in the sight of God.
verses.ct: We've rejected every shameful, underhanded method. We don't use tricks, and we don't twist the word of God. Instead, by presenting the truth plainly, we let every person's conscience judge us in the sight of God.

verses.kjv: But if our gospel be hid, it is hid to them that are lost:
verses.web: Even if our Good News is veiled, it is veiled in those who are dying,
verses.ct: If our gospel is hidden from anyone, it's hidden from those who are perishing.

verses.kjv: In whom the god of this world hath blinded the minds of them which believe not, lest the light of the glorious gospel of Christ, who is the image of God, should shine unto them.
verses.web: in whom the god of this world has blinded the minds of the unbelieving, that the light of the Good News of the glory of Christ, who is the image of God, should not dawn on them.
verses.ct: The god of this world has blinded the minds of unbelievers so that they can't see the light of the glorious gospel of Christ, who is the image of God.

verses.kjv: For we preach not ourselves, but Christ Jesus the Lord; and ourselves your servants for Jesus’ sake.
verses.web: For we don’t preach ourselves, but Christ Jesus as Lord, and ourselves as your servants for Jesus’ sake,
verses.ct: We don't preach about ourselves — we preach Christ Jesus as Lord. We're simply your servants for Jesus' sake.

verses.kjv: For God, who commanded the light to shine out of darkness, hath shined in our hearts, to give the light of the knowledge of the glory of God in the face of Jesus Christ.
verses.web: seeing it is God who said, “Light will shine out of darkness,” who has shone in our hearts to give the light of the knowledge of the glory of God in the face of Jesus Christ.
verses.ct: The same God who said, "Let light shine out of darkness," has made his light shine in our hearts, giving us the light of knowing God's glory as it shines in the face of Jesus Christ.

verses.kjv: But we have this treasure in earthen vessels, that the excellency of the power may be of God, and not of us.
verses.web: But we have this treasure in clay vessels, that the exceeding greatness of the power may be of God, and not from ourselves.
verses.ct: But we carry this treasure in clay jars, so that everyone can see the extraordinary power belongs to God and doesn't come from us.

verses.kjv: We are troubled on every side, yet not distressed; we are perplexed, but not in despair;
verses.web: We are pressed on every side, yet not crushed; perplexed, yet not to despair;
verses.ct: We're pressed hard on every side, but not crushed. We're confused, but not driven to despair.

verses.kjv: Persecuted, but not forsaken; cast down, but not destroyed;
verses.web: pursued, yet not forsaken; struck down, yet not destroyed;
verses.ct: We're persecuted, but never abandoned. We're knocked down, but never destroyed.

verses.kjv: Always bearing about in the body the dying of the Lord Jesus, that the life also of Jesus might be made manifest in our body.
verses.web: always carrying in the body the putting to death of the Lord Jesus, that the life of Jesus may also be revealed in our body.
verses.ct: We always carry the death of the Lord Jesus in our bodies, so that the life of Jesus can also be seen in us.

verses.kjv: For we which live are alway delivered unto death for Jesus’ sake, that the life also of Jesus might be made manifest in our mortal flesh.
verses.web: For we who live are always delivered to death for Jesus’ sake, that the life also of Jesus may be revealed in our mortal flesh.
verses.ct: As long as we live, we're constantly being handed over to death for Jesus' sake, so that the life of Jesus becomes visible in our mortal bodies.

verses.kjv: So then death worketh in us, but life in you.
verses.web: So then death works in us, but life in you.
verses.ct: So death is at work in us, but life is at work in you.

verses.kjv: We having the same spirit of faith, according as it is written, I believed, and therefore have I spoken; we also believe, and therefore speak;
verses.web: But having the same spirit of faith, according to that which is written, “I believed, and therefore I spoke.” We also believe, and therefore we also speak;
verses.ct: We share the same spirit of faith described in Scripture: "I believed, and so I spoke." We also believe, and that's why we speak.

verses.kjv: Knowing that he which raised up the Lord Jesus shall raise up us also by Jesus, and shall present us with you.
verses.web: knowing that he who raised the Lord Jesus will raise us also with Jesus, and will present us with you.
verses.ct: We know that the one who raised the Lord Jesus from the dead will raise us too along with Jesus, and will bring us together with you into his presence.

verses.kjv: For all things are for your sakes, that the abundant grace might through the thanksgiving of many redound to the glory of God.
verses.web: For all things are for your sakes, that the grace, being multiplied through the many, may cause the thanksgiving to abound to the glory of God.
verses.ct: All of this is for your benefit, so that as grace reaches more and more people, it will overflow into an ever-growing flood of thanksgiving that brings glory to God.

verses.kjv: For which cause we faint not; but though our outward man perish, yet the inward man is renewed day by day.
verses.web: Therefore we don’t faint, but though our outward man is decaying, yet our inward man is renewed day by day.
verses.ct: That's why we don't lose heart. Even though our outer selves are wasting away, our inner selves are being renewed day by day.

verses.kjv: For our light affliction, which is but for a moment, worketh for us a far more exceeding and eternal weight of glory;
verses.web: For our light affliction, which is for the moment, works for us more and more exceedingly an eternal weight of glory,
verses.ct: Our present troubles are small and temporary, but they're producing for us a glory that is eternal and far outweighs them all.

verses.kjv: While we look not at the things which are seen, but at the things which are not seen: for the things which are seen are temporal; but the things which are not seen are eternal.
verses.web: while we don’t look at the things which are seen, but at the things which are not seen. For the things which are seen are temporal, but the things which are not seen are eternal.
verses.ct: So we fix our eyes not on what we can see, but on what we can't see. What we can see is temporary, but what we can't see is eternal.
